root.name: Slotter Mania: Core Tokonatsu no Netsusa! Oasis
root.description: OverviewSlotter Mania: Core Tokonatsu no Netsusa! Oasis is a pachislot/gambling game developed and published by Dorasu, Inc. for the PlayStation platform. Slotter Mania: Core Tokonatsu no Netsusa! Oasis was never released outside of Japan.
